nction"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"wrap","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"ARCHITECTURE:      On Ethereum (hub), there are TWO EAGLE tokens:      1. EagleOVault (0xVAULT...) - Vault shares (from deposits)      2. EagleShareOFT (0xEEEE...) - OFT token (SAME address as all chains!)       This bridge converts between them 1:1 USER FLOWS:      - Deposit \u2192 Get vault shares \u2192 Wrap to OFT \u2192 Trade/Bridge      - Receive OFT \u2192 Unwrap to vault shares \u2192 Withdraw MECHANISM:      - wrap(): Lock vault shares, mint OFT (1:1)      - unwrap(): Burn OFT, release vault shares (1:1)      - Maintains perfect 1:1 peg      - No fees on wrapping/unwrapping","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"batchWhitelist(address[])":{"params":{"users":"Array of addresses to whitelist"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_oftEagle":"EagleShareOFT address (OFT token)","_owner":"Bridge owner","_vaultEagle":"EagleOVault address (vault shares)"}},"getReserves()":{"returns":{"locked":"Vault shares locked in bridge","minted":"OFT tokens minted by bridge"}},"isBalanced()":{"returns":{"_0":"True if locked vault shares == minted OFT tokens"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setFees(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_depositFee":"Deposit fee in basis points (max 10%)","_withdrawFee":"Withdraw fee in basis points (max 10%)"}},"setWhitelist(address,bool)":{"params":{"user":"Address to whitelist","whitelisted":"True to whitelist, false to remove"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). unwrap"}},"wrap(uint256)":{"details":"Locks vault shares, mints OFT tokens with 1% deposit fee (unless whitelisted)","params":{"amount":"Amount of vault shares to returns._0: True if locked vault shares == minted OFT tokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.whitelisted: True to whitelist, false to remove

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unwrap(uint256).details: Burns OFT tokens, releases vault shares with 2% withdraw fee (unless whitelisted)

params.amount: Amount of OFT tokens to unwrap

wrap(uint256).details: Locks vault shares, mints OFT tokens with 1% deposit fee (unless whitelisted)

params.amount: Amount of vault shares to wrap

isBalanced().notice: Check if bridge is balanced (should always be true)

setWhitelist(address,bool).notice: Add address to presale whitelist (no fees)

verify().notice: Emergency check - verify balances match accounting
